Name: Gallery Project
Platform: PHP/MySQL, (PostgreSQL, Oracle, DB2, Microsoft SQL Server only in 2.x version)
Upload: Local filesystem, HTTP, Java applet, Gallery Remote, Picasa 2, Import from Gallery 1.x, Windows XP Publishing Wizard, Local server, GLoSS, WebDAV (as of 2.2)

Name: MediaGoblin
Upload: HTTP, Android (just under a discontinued client)
Access Control: Yes, by controlling if registrations are allowed or not

Name: Piwigo
Upload: HTTP, FTP, local filesystem, Flash, Picasa, iPhoto, Digikam, Shotwell, Lightroom, iPhone/iPad and Android
Output: HTML 4.01 or HTML 5, CSS 2 (Complies with W3C specifications), theme for mobile devices
GeoTagging Support: plugin for Google Maps or plugin for OpenStreetMap

Name: Zenphoto
Output: HTML5, CSS, theme for mobile devices
GeoTagging Support: Yes Google Maps plugin included, plugin for OpenStreetMap available
Tags Categories Keywords: Yes (and pages, news/blog with the included Zenpage plugin)
Dynamic Image Processing: Yes Resize, sharpen, crop, rotate, B/W conversion, compression, watermarks.
